titleStmt.title: The vvandering-Jew, telling fortunes to English-men
titleStmt.author: Gad ben-Arod, ben-Balaam, ben-Ahimoth, ben-Baal, ben-Gog, ben-Magog.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Raworth, for Nathaniel Butter,

notesStmt.note: Preface signed: Gad ben-Arod, ben-Balaam, ben-Ahimoth, ben-Baal, ben-Gog, ben-Magog (a pseudonym).
Running title reads: The wandring Jew.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
